AddPodcastByRSSScreenText1: If a podcast is not officially available on Podverse, you can still listen to it by pasting the RSS link here and pressing the Save button.
AddPodcastByRSSScreenText2: If you are logged in, your podcasts added by RSS feed will be synced across your devices.
AddPodcastByRSSScreenText3: Clips and playlists are not supported for podcasts added by RSS feed.
AddPodcastByRSSScreenText4: If you want a podcast officially added to Podverse press the Request Podcast link below.
